title: Platform Pack
description: A dynamic platform for game developers
body:
I personally love platformers, such as Mario, Spyro and Crash. 

It's always been a dream of mine to create one of my own. I'm creating each of the major mechanics into well-done separate projects.

Starting with the platforms; made entirely in UE4 using C++, a single platform can be altered into a large variety of different platforms.
